title: Music Trivia, Chicago, Washington D.C., Phil Collins and more.
itunes:title: Music Trivia, Chicago, Washington D.C., Phil Collins and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is feeling himself and won't stop singing. Music trivia starts now. The Chief Love Officer has a "Boy Is Mine" type of situation involving a mother and daughter. Common professes his love for Tiffany Haddish. A couple has a viral video tied to Amazon.com that the crew discuss. Violence is still plaguing Chicago and Washington D.C. Twin brothers from YouTube listen to Phil Collins "In The Air Tonight" for the first time. Zelda Williams gets savage with Trump's son on Twitter. Today the show wraps the way it started with music trivia and Steve singing. Enjoy!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
